title: 怎么修改地狱堡垒的刷新几率
author: 华伦
txt_content:
游戏版本1.12.2由于服务器装有工业2mod  玩家都在地狱疯狂跑图  动不动搞了个量子装备
怕服务器凉了 所以我想调低地狱堡垒的刷新几率
感谢各位大佬

replies.author: 华伦
replies.txt_content:
[11:06:35] [Netty Server IO #2/ERROR]: There was a critical exception handling a packet on channel miac
java.lang.NullPointerException: null
[11:06:35] [Netty Server IO #2/ERROR]: Network Disconnect: A fatal error has occurred, this connection is terminated

玩家进服务器容易出现这个。。。。。
要第二遍才能进服务器
